Package ec.co.ant

Class SimpleConstructionRule

java.lang.Object
ec.co.ant.SimpleConstructionRule
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConstructionRule, Setup, Serializable
public class SimpleConstructionRule extends Object implements ConstructionRule, Setup
Builds an individual by adding one component at a time. The component is chosen using a ComponentSelector of your choice.
Author:
Eric O. Scott

    • setup

      public void setup(EvolutionState state, Parameter base)
      Description copied from interface: Setup
      Sets up the object by reading it from the parameters stored in state, built off of the parameter base base. If an ancestor implements this method, be sure to call super.setup(state,base); before you do anything else.
      Specified by:
      setup in interface Setup

    • constructSolution

      public ConstructiveIndividual constructSolution(EvolutionState state, ConstructiveIndividual ind, PheromoneTable pheromones, int thread)
      Constructs a solution by greedily adding the lowest-desirability component at each step until a complete solution is formed. The pheromone matrix argument is ignored, and may be null.
      Specified by:
      constructSolution in interface ConstructionRule
